title: Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp
description: Our Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp is an intensive 12-week program designed to turn beginners into proficient developers. You'll learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and more. This course includes hands-on projects and lifetime access to course materials. Get ready to launch your web development career!

title: Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH)
description: Become a Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH) and learn how to protect against cyber threats. This 6-month course covers topics such as penetration testing, network security, and ethical hacking techniques. Gain practical experience with real-world hacking simulations and receive a CEH exam voucher.

title: Data Science and Machine Learning Masterclass
description: Join our Data Science and Machine Learning Masterclass and unlock the power of data. Over 16 weeks, you'll delve into Python, data analysis, deep learning, and more. Build a strong portfolio and receive personalized career coaching to kickstart your data science journey.

title: AWS Cloud Essentials Workshop
description: Get hands-on with Amazon Web Services (AWS) in our 2-day Cloud Essentials Workshop. Learn to deploy and manage cloud resources, and receive free AWS credits for practice. Upon completion, you'll earn a course certificate.

title: iOS and Android App Development Course
description: Master mobile app development for both iOS and Android platforms. In this 10-week course, you'll learn Swift, Kotlin, and app design principles. Gain access to a mobile app testing lab equipped with various devices.

title: Certified DevOps Engineer
description: Become a Certified DevOps Engineer and optimize software development and deployment processes. Over 8 months, you'll gain hands-on experience with popular DevOps tools. This course includes a DevOps certification exam.
